statsIntroductionText:
Since this is the first time you're entering the stats screen, here is a short introduction.

This is where you can spend your available points by pressing on any one of the stats from the Stat screen. Upon each press, you will spend one available point in order to gain one level in that stat.

Your number of available points is shown at the top of the Stat screen.

You can cancel or confirm your changes by using the buttons at the bottom of the screen.

Every once in a while, the game will check to see if your stats are high enough to perform a certain action in a scene. If your stat level is not high enough you will fail your check, which will be announced by a red message on top of your screen. A succesful stat check will be shown in green. Here are two examples:

aboutIntroText:
Magium is a Choose Your Own Adventure game initially written and developed by Cristian Mihailescu.
Following the passing of the author in August 2024, this version of a game was developed in order to preserve the legacy of the game and allow for the community to continue the development of the game in the future, in accordance with the will of the family of the author.
